title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-k - Notification of fitness to proceed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-k - Notification of fitness to proceed

State Regulations
C.P.L. Article 730
FORM 16-k
12/88
NOTIFICATION OF FITNESS TO PROCEED
________ COURT OF ________
COUNTY OF ________
________x
PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, NOTIFICATION
OF FITNESS
TO PROCEED
- against -
________, Docket No. ________________
Defendant. Indictment No. ________________
________x
TO: The above-named court
TO: District Attorney, ________ County

You are hereby notified that the above-named
defendant, who was committed to the custody of the Commissioner of the (OMH)
(OMRDD) by order of this court, dated ________, and thereafter retained in such
custody by further order or orders of retention dated ____________
____________
(indicate if none)
and who is now confined, pursuant to
designation of said Commissioner, at ________ facility, of which I am in
charge, has been determined by me to be no longer an incapacitated
person. You are hereby requested to direct the Sheriff
of your county or your local Department of Correction to take custody of the
said defendant in accordance with the law. Dated: ________
_________
Signature of Director
_________
Printed Name
_________
Facility

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
16-k

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
